metadata.name: Virtunes Mystery NFT
metadata.description: Each Virtune is generated using an algorithmically and randomized combination of hand-animated traits. Each one comes with its own musical score, animated to be perfectly step in-time with the beat. Each audio stem is paired to a visual trait, and is designed in key and tempo, in order to be mixed seamlessly with another. The rarer the visual trait, the more energetic the music, creating potential for some of the most expressive Virtunes characters to become out-of-this-world superstars! We are the Virtunes. We are Musicians in the Metaverse.
